# What type of laser pointer can I use with Cozmo? {#what-type-of-laser-pointer-can-i-use-with-cozmo .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

::: sections
When Laser chaser is activated, Cozmo can track any standard red or
green laser. He likes bright dots!

![Laser_Chaser.png](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d772604286364bc975c76/img-3326-1585280666-1809287804.png){width="128"
height="128"}

LED Pointers that project big shapes, such as hearts or moons, will not
work.

For safety, DDL recommends FDA Approved, Class 1 lasers. Always use
lasers with adult supervision.

Laser Chaser first appeared in the Cozmo 2.1.0 update. 
:::
